msbt.message: The claws on this Dinoeeeyuckus are real, real big!Their grandmas shoulda sat on 'em and trimmed their nails! Maybe gave 'em snacks so they'd stop wiggling
Wow, just look at the giant horns on that megasalsa!They'd be waaaaay too heavy to have on my head. I'd fall over more than I already do!
THAT'S a Pator— Um Pargel— Uh Mana huh Potatopasghetidon?<10_4 /> That's a dinosaur with real big wings!
Tiramisu rex's mouths are sooo teethy! Man, I bet they'd have made us into snacks with one bite!
The sausagersaurs's back plates are SO COOL! I'd look cool with those too, don'tcha think?
Broccolisaurs have real looong necks! It musta took them a long time to swallow their snacks!
Mammothses's big 'ol tusks are crazy amazing! I'd be pretty cool if I had a pair of those growing outta my face!
Whoa, look at all those fins! I could swim real quick with those!

Eggplantapotomuses look like regular normal fish, but they're actually the ancestors of frogs!What would ya call that? "Ancerogs"? "Frogcestors"? "Ancesfrogstors"?Oh. Ignore me. I'm just sayin' stuff 'cause it's fun to say.
Look at that big old mouth! They coulda won any snack-eating competition they entered!
That's a Quetzalcoatlus. A lotta folks are real surprised I can say "Quetzalcoatlus" so easy.The secret is to open your mouthand let the word fall out.<10_4 /> Quetzalcoatlus.
Wow! It's a coprolite! Know what that is? Fossilized poop! Pretty gross, huh?
The jellymuncha is so small! I guess all the dinosaurs weren't huge during the olden days, huh?
Blathers is telling everybody how you're the one who found this fossil! That's so cool, !You must be real proud, huh?
Whoa, so this is how the evolvified? And that's why I look the way I do? Neat, !
